item.title: HTB UNI CTF : Light The Way
item.description: Light the was a challenge with a medium difficulty level that tested a personâ€™s knowledge of the SCADA system. Before starting this challenge, I was clueless about this system. I learned a lot through this challenge, and I hope I can share some knowledge with you. SCADA Supervisory control and data acquisition is a system that allows industrial organizations to: * Conrtol processes * Monitor * Interact with devices * Record events For more information on SCADA
